Sparks.Station Casino Reno:
Station Casino Reno is a proposed hotel and casino located at the intersection of Kietzke Lane and South Virginia Street next to the Reno-Sparks Convention Center in Reno, Nevada. The land is owned by Station Casinos and is located on 8 acres (3.2 ha) of land.
The building design is similar to Aliante (formerly known as Aliante Station), Green Valley Ranch and Red Rock Resort.
